title: Angel
overview: Angel, a teen who is determinedÂ to escape her abusive guardian Teresa. Angel warms the hearts of viewers as she humbly steps up to care for her three foster sisters Sheree, Milk and Rain. Angel finds herself in the concrete jungle surrounded by animals. Diamond and Dutch attempt to show Angel the ways of the streets, but her arrogance and lack of experience gets in her way. With no money, nowhere to live and pursued by Detective Monroe, Angel's only choice is to become a beast.
